web_snippets: Shah (born 1973/1974) is an American businessman, and co-founder, co-chairman, and CEO of online retailer Wayfair. Niraj Shah. Born, 1973 or 1974 (age 50–51).
Niraj Shah - Board Director ... Day Job: CEO, Wayfair, Inc. What Makes Me Tick: My family. My work. Thinking logically. Using data and math to solve problems.
Niraj Shah co-founded Wayfair with Steve Conine in 2002 and the pair rapidly grew the business to become the largest online retailer of home furnishings.
